theme: The setting is the world of the book series "Wings of Fire," specifically book 4, "The Dark Secret." Most scenes happen in the NightWing kingdom, the hidden volcano, or the Rainforest Kingdom. Dragonets like Starflight, Glory, Fatespeaker, and other NightWings and RainWings may sometimes be mentioned. These characters and places do not need to appear in every sentence.
title: Avery's Wings of Fire Vocbab - {section}

sections.subtitle: Marshy tunnels, sharp spines, and habits in the Dark Secret
